'''Pavel''' {{Lang|ru=Павел|ru_rm=Pavel}} is a member of the [[Fatui]]. He can be found in [[Springvale]], [[Mondstadt]], by the road leading to [[Dadaupa Gorge]]. He is a subordinate of [[Tsarevich]].

===Personality===
Little is known about Pavel, but it can be seen that he is openly disdainful toward Mondstadt. He is also standoffish toward the [[Traveler]] when he is attempted to be spoken to.

===Appearance===
Pavel has short, slicked-back, blonde-colored hair and wears the typical men's Fatui uniform.
